db:abstract.db:para: The Hierarchy example is shows how to write an in-process ActiveX control. The control is a QWidget subclass with child widgets that are accessible as sub-types.

db:article.db:programlisting:
include(../shared.pri)
TEMPLATE = lib TARGET = hierarchyax
CONFIG += warn_off dll QT += widgets axserver
SOURCES = objects.cpp main.cpp HEADERS = objects.h RC_FILE = hierarchy.rc DEF_FILE = hierarchy.def
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/activeqt/hierarchy INSTALLS += target
